properties.description: Notebook to summarize SEC Form 10Q statement using AOAI

source:
L1TransformInstanceID = None
L1TransformID = None
IngestID = None
CustomParameters = None
InputRawFileSystem = None
InputRawFileFolder = None
InputRawFile = None
InputRawFileDelimiter = None
InputFileHeaderFlag = None
OutputL1CurateFileSystem = None
OutputL1CuratedFolder = None
OutputL1CuratedFile = None
OutputL1CuratedFileDelimiter = None
OutputL1CuratedFileFormat = None
OutputL1CuratedFileWriteMode = None

OutputDWTableWriteMode = None

# Parameters for Testing only, should be commented off
L1TransformInstanceID = 6
L1TransformID = 8
IngestID = 5
CustomParameters = None
InputRawFileSystem = 'raw-bronze'
InputRawFileFolder = 'sec-form10q/2023/04'
InputRawFile = '2023-04-15_204450_sec-form10q.json'
InputRawFileDelimiter = None
InputFileHeaderFlag = None
OutputL1CurateFileSystem = 'curated-silver'
OutputL1CuratedFolder = 'sec-form10q/2023/04'
OutputL1CuratedFile = 'standardized_2023-04-15_204525_sec-form10q.json'
OutputL1CuratedFileDelimiter = None
OutputL1CuratedFileFormat = 'json'
OutputL1CuratedFileWriteMode = 'overwrite'
OutputDWStagingTable = None
LookupColumns = None
OutputDWTable = None
OutputDWTableWriteMode = None
ReRunL1TransformFlag = None
DeltaName = None

from pyspark.sql.functions import *
df = readFile(InputRawFileSystem, InputRawFileFolder +"/" + InputRawFile, None, None)

# extract datapoints of interest and explode array
# df.printSchema()

df = df.select( col("org_name.content").alias("org_name")
                ,col("org_address.content").alias("org_address")
                ,col("org_jurisdiction.content").alias("org_jurisdiction")
                ,col("org_stock_ticker.content").alias("org_stock_ticker")
                ,col("reporting_quarter.content").alias("reporting_quarter")
                ,col("stock_exchange.content").alias("stock_exchange")
                ,col("total_assets.content").alias("total_assets")
                ,col("total_comprehensive_income.content").alias("total_comprehensive_income")
                ,col("total_equity.content").alias("total_equity")
                ,col("total_liabilities.content").alias("total_liabilities")                
                ,col("controls_procedures.content").alias("controls_procedures")
                ,col("mgmt_analysis.content").alias("mgmt_analysis")
                ,col("risk_disclosure.content").alias("risk_disclosure")
            )

display(df)
# df = df.select("re_agency","owner","re_agency_address","rental_address","statement_date","tenant","total_payment"
#                 ,col("statement details.valueObject.amount.valueString").alias("item_amount")
#                 ,col("statement details.valueObject.item description.valueString").alias("item_description"))
# df.printSchema()

#write flattened json to curated zone of data lake
# writeFile(df,OutputL1CurateFileSystem, OutputL1CuratedFolder + "/" + OutputL1CuratedFile)
